The Binding of Isaac Rebirth: The Binding of Isaac is a randomly generated action RPG shooter
with heavy Rogue-like elements. Following Isaac on his journey
players will find bizarre treasures that change Isaac’s form giving
him super human abilities and enabling him to fight off droves of
mysterious creatures, discover secrets and fight his way to safety.
Elden Ring: THE CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED FANTASY ACTION RPG. Rise, Tarnished, and
be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become
an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.
Hollow Knight: Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through
a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes. Explore twisting caverns,
battle tainted creatures and befriend bizarre bugs, all in a classic,
Minecraft: a sandbox video game where players can build and explore a procedurally
generated three-dimensional world made of blocks. Players can collect
resources, craft items, and build structures in both survival and creative
modes. The game features a vast, diverse world with various biomes and
